courses.title: Beginner Guitar Course
courses.description: This course is designed for absolute beginners who want to learn how to play the guitar. No prior experience is required.

courses.title: Intermediate Guitar Techniques
courses.description: Take your guitar playing to the next level with this intermediate course focusing on techniques such as fingerpicking, chord progressions, and soloing.

courses.title: Advanced Guitar Masterclass
courses.description: Refine your skills and explore advanced concepts in this masterclass for experienced guitarists. Dive deep into improvisation, music theory, and advanced repertoire.

courses.title: Guitar Theory Fundamentals
courses.description: Learn the essential music theory concepts that every guitarist should know, including scales, chords, and progressions.

courses.title: Acoustic Guitar Basics
courses.description: Discover the beauty of acoustic guitar playing with this introductory course covering basic chords, strumming patterns, and popular songs.

courses.title: Blues Guitar Workshop
courses.description: Immerse yourself in the world of blues guitar with this workshop-style course. Learn iconic riffs, licks, and improvisation techniques.

courses.title: Electric Guitar Effects Mastery
courses.description: Unlock the potential of your electric guitar with this course on effects pedals, signal chains, and sound sculpting techniques.

courses.title: Fingerstyle Guitar Techniques
courses.description: Develop your fingerstyle guitar skills with this course focusing on Travis picking, classical fingerpicking, and modern fingerstyle techniques.

courses.title: Jazz Guitar Improvisation
courses.description: Explore the art of improvisation in jazz guitar with this comprehensive course covering scales, chord voicings, and soloing concepts.

courses.title: Metal Guitar Shredding Techniques
courses.description: Master the high-speed techniques of metal guitar playing, including shredding, sweep picking, and advanced soloing approaches.
